name: Yuhong Yan
content: Dr. Yuhong Yan My research is focused on Service Computing, which brings flexibility, interoperability, and composability to software systems. I teach my students to build enterprise level applications and how to use AI techniques in research and real world projects. I am looking for talented graudate students who are motivated to pursue a master's or a ph.d. degree. Normally I recruit graduate students from our master's program. If you are interested, please talk with me during my office hour. My current projects: Genetic Report Counseiling AI: collaborate with ebogenes.com, we developed a AI chat bot to answer the patientâs queries about their genetic testing report. A genetic testing report is over 2000 pages that cover all the aspects about health, ancestry, drugs, etc. You can access the AI Genetic Consultant page here and the Ebogenes AI Product Assistant here. City Getaway: collaborate with Montreal based Concord Tours, we are building a smart travel platform for Free Independent Traveller. Via chatting, our smart planner can generate itinerary from our domain knowledge base. At travel time, our smart travel assistant can provide guide information, real time alerts, and adaptation of itinerary. We have reached the top level in the tourism industry. The final product will be in the market by the end of 2025. Supported by MITACS. You can try our AI enabled travel plan here . Quebec Bus tours: collaborate with Concord Tours, we developed a software system that supports the travel agency, the guide, and the travelers during bus tours. The travelers can use their mobile phones to access the tour information, chat, and the guideâs announcement. It is under testing and trail usage. Supported by MITACS. office hour: Sabbatical 6.2025-5.2026. Contact me via phone or email. My office is at ER1147, 2215 Guy, MontrÃ©al, QC H3H 2L9 yuhong.yan at concordia.ca (514) 848-2424 * 8715 (forwarded to my cell) My New Book on Web Programming My book "Web Programming with Modern Full Stack Technology" is distributed by Amazon since April, 2025. This textbook distills my over 15 years of university teaching and real-world web development experience into a clear, concise, and highly practical resource. The front-end techniques are HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, mastering layout, styling, and interactive elements. The back-end techniques is Node.js and Python. This book serves as the textbook for the core course SOEN 287 Web Programming. This book stands out for concise explanations with rich, real-world examples, It focuses on the most relevant skills for todayâs web development jobs. Source code, lecture slides, and practice assignments are available. My Ph.D. student Touraj Laleh's following paper has won the Best Student Paper Award in the 7th International Conference on Cloud Computing and Services Science (CLOSER 2017) Touraj Laleh, Joey Paquest, Serguei Mokhov, and Yuhong Yan, "Predictive Failure Recovery in Constraint-aware Web Service Composition". My Ph.D. student Jing Li's following paper has won the Best Student Paper Award at the 11th IEEE International Conference on Service Computing (SCC 2014) Jing Li, Yuhong Yan, and Daniel Lemire, "Full Solution Indexing Using Database for QoS-aware Web Service Composition". My following paper is currently the top 1 most frequently downloaded paper for IEEE Transaction on Network and Service Management: Qiang Duan, Yuhong Yan, and Vasilakos, A.V.A, "Survey on Service-Oriented Network Virtualization Toward Convergence of Networking and Cloud Computing" . My following paper has won an award for "the most cited CSCWD paper 2001-2011" in 2013: Yuhong Yan, Zakaria Maamar, and Weiming Shen, "Integration of Workflow and Agent Technology for Business Process Management", IEEE International Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work in Design (CSCWD) 2001. As a software engineering professor, I believe industrial practices are critical for enhancing my knowledge and updating my skills. I have received funding from NSERC Engage and MITACS for industrial collaboration. Currently I am looking for new graduate students and undergraduate students. We have interesting research topics and interesting projects from local companies. Projects Publications Teaching Students © Dr. Yuhong Yan, 2020.
